verses.verse: <S%G2597><s%> And When Had Come Down <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain, <S%G3735><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Great. <S%G4183><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Leper <S%G3015><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Did Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Thou Wilt <S%G2309><s%> Thou Art Able <S%G1410><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Cleanse. <S%G2511><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Stretched Out <S%G1614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Hand <S%G5495><s%> Touched <S%G680><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I Will, <S%G2309><s%> Be Thou Cleansed. <S%G2511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Was Cleansed <S%G2511><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Leprosy. <S%G3014><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> See <S%G3708><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%>, Thou Tell; <S%G2036><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%>, Go <S%G5217><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Shew <S%G1166><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Priest, <S%G2409><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Offer <S%G4374><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1435><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ordered <S%G4367><s%>, Moses <S%G3475><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Testimony <S%G3142><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1525><s%> And Having Entered <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%>, Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Centurion, <S%G1543><s%> Beseeching <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3816><s%> My Servant <S%G3450><s%> Is Laid <S%G906><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%>, Paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> Grievously <S%G1171><s%> Tormented. <S%G928><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Having Come 2064 V-2AAP-NSM Will Heal 2323 V-FAI-1S Him. 846 P-ASM

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Centurion <S%G1543><s%>, Said, <S%G5346><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Am Not <S%G1510><s%> Worthy <S%G2425><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Roof <S%G4721><s%> Thou Shouldest Come, <S%G1525><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> Speak <S%G2036><s%>, A Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be Healed <S%G2390><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3816><s%> My Servant. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> I 1473 P-1NS A Man 444 N-NSM Am 1510 V-PXI-1S Under 5259 PREP Authority, 1849 N-ASF Having 2192 V-PAP-NSM ' Under 5259 PREP Myself 1683 F-1ASM Soldiers; 4757 N-APM And 2532 CONJ I Say 3004 V-PAI-1S, To This One, 5129 D-DSM, Go, 4198 V-AOM-2S And 2532 CONJ, He Goes; 4198 V-PNI-3S And 2532 CONJ . To Another, 243 A-DSM, Come, 2064 V-PNI-2S And 2532 CONJ, He Comes; 2064 V-PNI-3S And 2532 CONJ 3588 T-DSM 1401 N-DSM, To My Bondman, 3450 P-1GS Do 4160 V-AAM-2S, This, 5124 D-ASN And 2532 CONJ He Does It. 4160 V-PAI-3S

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Wondered, <S%G2296><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> Following, <S%G190><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> So Great <S%G5118><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Have I Found. <S%G2147><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> But I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> From <S%G575><s%> East <S%G395><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> West <S%G1424><s%> Shall Come, <S%G2240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Recline At Table <S%G347><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens; <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Shall Be Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Outer : <S%G1857><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Weeping <S%G2805><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gnashing <S%G1030><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%>, Centurion, <S%G1543><s%> Go, <S%G5217><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Thou Hast Believed <S%G4100><s%> Be It <S%G1096><s%> To Thee. <S%G4671><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Healed <S%G2390><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3816><s%> His Servant <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> That. <S%G1565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3994><s%> His Wife's Mother <S%G846><s%> Laid <S%G906><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In A Fever; <S%G4445><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Touched <S%G680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Her Hand, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Left <S%G863><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Fever; <S%G4446><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She Arose <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ministered <S%G1247><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3798><s%> And Evening <S%G1161><s%> Being Come, <S%G1096><s%> They Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Possessed With Demons <S%G1139><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> By A Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Ill <S%G2560><s%> Were <S%G2192><s%> He Healed : <S%G2323><s%>

So That <S%G3704><s%> Might Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Infirmities <S%G769><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> Took, <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Diseases <S%G3554><s%> Bore. <S%G941><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Seeing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Around <S%G4012><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> He Commanded <S%G2753><s%> To Depart <S%G565><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side. <S%G4008><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> A Scribe <S%G1122><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> I Will Follow <S%G190><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3699><s%> Whithersoever <S%G1437><s%> Thou Mayest Go. <S%G565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Foxes <S%G258><s%> Holes <S%G5454><s%> Have, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G4071><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Nests, <S%G2682><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Has Not <S%G2192><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> He May Lay. <S%G2827><s%>

Another <S%G2087><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Allow <S%G2010><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> To Go <S%G565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bury <S%G2290><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Leave <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> To Bury <S%G2290><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G1438><s%> Dead. <S%G3498><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1684><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship, <S%G4143><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> A Tempest <S%G4578><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Arose <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Was Covered <S%G2572><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waves; <S%G2949><s%> <S%G846><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Was Sleeping. <S%G2518><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Awoke <S%G1453><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Save <S%G4982><s%>, Us; <S%G2248><s%> We Perish. <S%G622><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Fearful <S%G1169><s%> Are Ye, <S%G2075><s%> O Ye Of Little Faith? <S%G3640><s%> Then, <S%G5119><s%> Having Arisen <S%G1453><s%> He Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Winds <S%G417><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Calm <S%G1055><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Wondered, <S%G2296><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What Kind Of Man <S%G4217><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> This, <S%G3778><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Winds <S%G417><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> Obey <S%G5219><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When Had Come <S%G2064><s%> He <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side <S%G4008><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country <S%G5561><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%>, Gergesenes, <S%G1086><s%> Met <S%G5221><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Possessed By Demons <S%G1139><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tombs <S%G3419><s%> Coming, <S%G1831><s%> Violent <S%G5467><s%> Very, <S%G3029><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Was Able <S%G2480><s%> Any One <S%G5100><s%> To Pass <S%G3928><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3598><s%> That Way. <S%G1565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> They Cried Out, <S%G2896><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> ; Of God? <S%G2316><s%> Art Thou Come <S%G2064><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Before The <S%G4253><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> To Torment <S%G928><s%> ; Us? <S%G2248><s%>
<S%G2258><s%> Now There Was <S%G1161><s%> Far Off <S%G3112><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> A Herd <S%G34><s%> Of Swine <S%G5519><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Feeding; <S%G1006><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Demons <S%G1142><s%> Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Allow <S%G2010><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> To Go Away <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Herd <S%G34><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Swine. <S%G5519><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Go. <S%G5217><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> Went Away <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Herd <S%G34><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Swine : <S%G5519><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Rushed <S%G3729><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Herd <S%G34><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Swine <S%G5519><s%> Down <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Steep <S%G2911><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waters. <S%G5204><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But Those Who <S%G1161><s%> Fed Them <S%G1006><s%> Fled, <S%G5343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Away <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Related <S%G518><s%> Everything, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Events <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Concerning Those Possessed By Demons. <S%G1139><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Meet <S%G4877><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> They Besought Him <S%G3870><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> He Would Depart <S%G3327><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3725><s%> Their Borders. <S%G846><s%>
